subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: Rusty Hardin’s goal in representing Roger Clemens and conducting his own investigation is to prove that the allegation that Clemens used steroids and H.G.H. is false.
snippet: Rusty Hardin’s goal in representing Roger Clemens and conducting his own investigation is to prove that the allegation that Clemens used steroids and H.G.H. is false.
